Question
========

$ \begin{aligned} A & = \left \{ x \mid x = 2k, k \in Z \right
\}\\ B & = \left \{ x \mid x = 2k + 1, k \in Z \right \}\\ C
& = \left \{ x \mid x = 2(k + 1), k \in Z \right \}\\ D & =
\left \{ x \mid x = 2k - 1, k \in Z \right \} \end{aligned} $\
Welke van deze verzamelingen zijn aan elkaar gelijk?

Answerlist
----------

* A = B, B = C
* A = B, C = D
* A = C, B = C
* A = C, B = D
* A = D, B = C
* A = D, B = D

Solution
========

Het correcte antwoord is: 

* A = C, B = D
